markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 17+"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Celestial Peach](/Equipment.aspx?ID=769)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=137" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Divine" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=48" />
<trait label="Healing" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=89" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Necromancy" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=117" />
<trait label="Positive" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=128" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Legends](/Sources.aspx?ID=40) pg. 48</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Single Action" /><row>Interact</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

Among Hao Jin's most precious treasures are three living plants, the last surviving celestial peach trees taken from the mountains of Chu Ye. One of the trees grows pearls in place of flowers, but the other two bear fruit that is far more valuable. Eating one of these small red peaches can heal even the most grievous of injuries.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 17"
pfs="Standard"
>
Celestial Peach (Rejuvenation)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Legends](/Sources.aspx?ID=40) pg. 48</row>

**Price** 3,000 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** L

</row>

</column>

---

You gain the effects of 7th-level [_neutralize poison_](/Spells.aspx?ID=207), [_regenerate_](/Spells.aspx?ID=248), [_remove curse_](/Spells.aspx?ID=250), and [_remove disease_](/Spells.aspx?ID=251) spells. The peach has a [counteract](/Rules.aspx?ID=371) modifier of +27.

<title
level="2"
right="Item 20"
pfs="Standard"
>
Celestial Peach (Life)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Legends](/Sources.aspx?ID=40) pg. 48</row>

**Price** 73,000 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** L

</row>

</column>

---

When you place the peach into the mouth of an intact corpse that died within the last year, it casts a 10th-level [_raise dead_](/Spells.aspx?ID=243) on the corpse.
name: Celestial Peach
